sentences: Andsid jah! Ära salga ühtegi, mina ise nägin ...
Hommikul lähed, ja tuled, kui nälg ajab. Abi ei ole sust ühtegi!
context: The Estonian word 'ühtegi' is an adverb used to express negation in the sense of 'not at all', 'nothing', or 'not a single thing'. It's commonly used with negative constructions and often appears before nouns or other elements being negated. In the examples provided, it's used to emphasize that nothing was hidden ('Ära salga ühtegi' - Don't hide anything) and that there is no help from someone ('Abi ei ole sust ühtegi' - There is no help from you at all).
